title: LOW PİNG BİG LAGGGGGGG
body:
I LIVE IN TURKEY I HAVE 117 PİNG İN GAME HE IS NOT BİG BUT HAVE VERRY BİG LAG ANYONE HELP ME PLS ?

AND I NOT SEE THIS PROBLEM İN TURKEY SERVER

replies.body:
If you're only seeing this issue when connecting to the EUW servers, it's very likely that the issue is happening along your network routing to those specific servers. I'd recommend running a traceroute log with [**WinMTR**](http://winmtr.net/) so we can determine where this may be happening along your routing. After loading up the app, simply plug **185.40.65.1** into the host field and start the trace. After 5 minutes has gone by, you can export the results of the trace to TEXT and paste them in a reply.

Let me know if you run into any issues.
If you don't lag on the Turkey Server, use the Turkey server. If you are playing in another region, you will get some lag due to your distance from the server.
